website_summaries.verdict: The best gel to keep eyebrows firmly in place all day long.
pros: Clear gel shapes brows and helps keep them in place all day
The formula dries quickly but never flakes or looks crusty
Gel prevents color from pencil or powder brow products from smudging or fading
Clear gel is ideal for all hair colors
cons: Gel has a strong scent when applying, but the scent fades when dry

customer_reviews.title: Another knockout product by Anastasia
customer_reviews.text: I love a nice eyebrow. I was thinking about a brow gel for quite some time and finally decided to order this to fulfill my one-day shipping amount. This stuff is the bee's knees. Absolutely love how it keeps my brows in place, doesn't look greasy or like I lathered up with gel. I get my brows tinted and this makes my mornings even easier. You just brush it on and call it good. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BOO3Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and effect
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to be makeup-free for a month now. The hardest part is making sure my eyes don't look tired and without life in the morning. Having this product around has helped with that. I use it as both a mascara and brow gel, and although it's clear, it makes a huge different. I look awake and I do not have to worry about putting makeup on every morning. Plus, the effect lasts all day. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Long time user, hate the new applicator
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brow gel for years, and loved the color and staying power. However, the most recent one I bought came with a different style applicator, which I strongly dislike. The distribution of the product onto my brows is uneven at best. The product also seems to go on a lot lighter, which I guess would be good if you wanted a lot of control, but I find I have to put layer after layer on to get the look I like. It takes way more time now to get the same result with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate E.

customer_reviews.title: Anastasia changed the brush on their signature Eyebrow Gel and RUINED the product
customer_reviews.text: I absolute hate the new brush on the Anastasia Eyebrow Gel, that I have been using for years. The new brush is horrible, it leaves large chunks of the Gel in your eyebrow's and streaks your skin underneath your eyebrows. Sadly, I now have to search for a new brand to replace the eyebrow gel I have been using and loving for years, as Anastasia decided to fix something that WASN'T broken. The new brush is horrible and has completely ruined Anastasia's signature Eyebrow Gel. I do not recommend this product, it went from Hero to Zero!
customer_reviews.author: Margaux1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I used to use L'Oreal Brown Gel Plumper and really liked it. My sister is an aspiring make up artist and she recommend this product. I absolutely love the fact that is is very easy and the brush is big. It makes it easier to apply this. It stays all day as well and it looks as if you're not wearing anything aside from the fact that it does make your eyebrows look nicely combed and not wild. I highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a great brush applicator and a great formula.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Ooops! Auburn means brown.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a natural redhead, on the coppery auburn side of the spectrum, and the auburn shade was WAY too dark for me. The liquid looks reddish but is basically dark brown when applied. It didn't add even a hint of red to my brows, which is what I was after, and was so dark it looked like I was wearing stage makeup (i.e., clownish). Clearly I should have gone with caramel or brunette, or another product altogether. As for holding power etc. I cannot say, because I will never wear this! Expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Zola

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.text: In my seventies, my hair is still mostly its original brown color, but my eyebrows are very sparse and colorless. Brows drawn in with eyebrow pencil are always too dark, and the harsh outlines are a dead give away, unless you have a very artistic hand for lightly drawing in feathery strokes, which I don't. This brunette tint is NOT too dark, it makes for very natural looking brows - AND, I often use a little bit to touch up a few white hairs at my temples, just for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: V. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: eh ok
customer_reviews.text: I really love abh brow products, I use the skinny pencil and the fatter wedge shaped one in my daily routine so I had high hopes for this guy. unfortunately, even though i got the color brown (same color I use in the pencils) it came off kind of red, like too red, for me. not abh's fault and I'll always buy her stuff (palette addict here lol) but this just didn't do it for me. I'll be sticking to her pencils w a bit of boy brow
customer_reviews.author: lindsey loo

customer_reviews.title: Brunette is not brunette
customer_reviews.text: The color was golden. Not brunette. It doesn’t match my eye brown or hair in the slightest bit. Very disappointed in color and name of color. This is absolutely for blondes. Very gold color. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Never received
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I like this product but the package arrived empty. I can’t figure out how to handle this, getting it replaced at no charge . What do I do?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good!!
customer_reviews.text: This applicator came without any gel in itl!! Pumping it and scraping the sides did not work. I've used this product for almost two years. I purchased the original from a salon. It still has gel in it even after daily use for all that time. What is going on? I purchased two tried and true products through Amazon recently and both were duds. Not good!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Been purchasing Anastasia products for years...the Caramel color brow gel wasn't covering my brow enough so I purchased the Brunette color.....just delivered and tried it. Definitely not much better than the Caramel. I was going to purchase the Chocolate, but thought it would be too dark. So I checked the policy regarding returning Brunette and getting the Chocolate....Low and behold, on my order sheet it said no returns. No where did I read that in the advertisement......very disappointed that I have to spend another $22 for the gel.....
customer_reviews.author: janeilene

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, natural color, it just works.
customer_reviews.text: I had used a product from another brand to color my brows for years and then they discontinued the product. I went searching--not even knowing that what I wanted was a brow gel. I was so glad when I found this. It works just as the old one did. Easy to apply, natural color, it just works.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Richards

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: First of all let me preface this by saying that I don't wear a lot of makeup if any at all. I love this one so much that I prefer to not even leave the house without this on. It's a beautiful color. I just wish the brush was designed differently to where it was a little bigger in front.
customer_reviews.author: Karnew06

customer_reviews.title: It okay
customer_reviews.text: The product stays on all day, it does define the hairs on your brow very well and looks very natural. However, it does clump and smear ALOT that is taken care of pretty easily with a Q-tip. The applicator is a little small, the longer row of brushes is nice, however, it runs out and needs to be flipped to the shorter sides or refilled before both brows are done.
customer_reviews.author: PatiIowa

customer_reviews.title: Good hold but...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my old drug store brow gel had dried up and decided to try higher end. When I received this product everything was amazing except for the color; which was my own fault. Unfortunately you cannot return this product due to health safety reasons (again it was my fault in the first place). It has a very strong hold and your brows will stay in place all day without budging. I would recommend either doing more research on what color you should buy or going into Sephora to swatch.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Brow Gel
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different brow gels now (Kat Von D, NYX, a couple drug store cheapies) and I always come back to Anastasia's. The formula dries really clear and doesn't cake up on the hairs. Lasts all day and looks very natural. Sometimes I wish the spooly/applicator was a little bit smaller for more precise use. Make sure to clean the applicator every once in a while to keep the product from getting gunky or tinting from your brow fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Tavish

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for now
customer_reviews.text: I have crazy eyebrows and needed some help. This will keep them in place. My one issue with the product is the crunchy feel to my eyebrows after using. Occasionally there is even specks that look like dandruff or hairspray in my eyebrows if I'm not careful. Otherwise I will use this until I find something better.
customer_reviews.author: C. Klar

customer_reviews.title: Espresso Way too dark,  like the product though.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Anastasia for years but lately had problems finding my color. One is too dark, one is too red. I cannot read the original info on the one I liked so much. Frustrating. then, with computer screens being what they are, you never really know what color will arrive. This is VERY dark. Unless you have jet black hair, it will be too dark for most people.
customer_reviews.author: exflyer

customer_reviews.title: Barely Any Product in Tube
customer_reviews.text: The tube has very little product in it and is practically dry inside. The product that is there works amazing. I love this brow gel and it makes your brows look really natural and stay put. However, as this item seems faulty I am giving it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting formula, hate the big brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love the durability and naturally glossy finish of the Anastasia clear brow gel. However, my one point of contention is the size of the spoolie brush! I experienced the same issue with Anastasia's tinted brow gels as well – the brush is so large that product is difficult to control. I frequently applied the gel to "peach fuzz" above my eyebrows, and it seems like there's always too much product on the brush. I resolved the issue by buying a smaller spoolie brush and using that instead of the one attached to the lid, but I shouldn't have to. But best clear brow gel formulation out there!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but works well enough
customer_reviews.text: I used to use hairspray for my brows, but decided to buy something “made for it,” did a lot of research and settled on this! Holds my brows all day, as long as I don’t get my face wet or rub them. Overall, definitely better than hairspray, but I don’t understand why it’s as expensive as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Maridith

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK FOR ME!
customer_reviews.text: The gel does not help my curly brows. My brows are curlier than most so I can't blame it on the gel. No one has produced a gel strong enough to hold them in place.
customer_reviews.author: BillieDee

customer_reviews.title: Best ‘stay put’ brow shape holding gel I’ve EVER used!!
customer_reviews.text: YES!!! You can NEVER go wrong with this clear eyebrow gel. The precision and HOLD is incomparable! I’ve yet to find an Anastasia product that is NOT fabulous. I would recommend this to ANYONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Walk

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and this product. You can’t get this cheaper at a drug store but it is nice to try out the goood stuff every now and then. My eyebrow hairs stay in place for hours with this product. I apply it before I do anything to my face so it dries by the time I go to fill in my brows. I apply this first so that I don’t get brow makeup on this wand.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn FieldingTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: The only eyebrow gel I use!
customer_reviews.text: I have eyebrows that just won't stay in place no matter what I use. This has been my go-to product for years to keep my eyebrows in check! I have latina eyebrows which means my eyebrow hairs are pin straight. No matter what I do I have to they continue to go in a direction I don't want them to. Luckily with this product it tames my eyebrow hairs and makes them stay i place. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Your Eyebrows' Best Friend!
customer_reviews.text: Having tried many other eyebrow pencils, I have found this one to be the best. A great, skinny tipped, propelling pencil for precise applicationon at one end with a brow brush on the other. I brush on Anastastia Clear Brow Gel to seal in the pencil colour and it really does last all day.
customer_reviews.author: K Grant

customer_reviews.title: It is visible on dark skinned girls. It gives you a softer look
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product doesn't make your hair very stiff like other brands. The only thing I wished it had was a eyebrow liner brush for a precise shaping of your brows. Other than that it's a great product
customer_reviews.author: Bryana

customer_reviews.title: The color is a dark blonde or light brown, not brunette
customer_reviews.text: The color was ok although it should be light brown not brunette. I expect A dark brown when is labeled as brunette and this is not. The brush is huge and bristles are too long. Not coming back for another.
customer_reviews.author: New England Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best Brow Products I have found in my 60+ years
customer_reviews.text: None better This is not a asked for review after 20 years I have used her products and will continue, getting to pricey for my budget but I am trying!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a natural redhead with transparent brows and lashes. This stuff is great for making my eyebrows visible again. A couple quick swipes and my brows are good for the day. Just don't get it on your skin! If you get it on the skin, then it's super obvious that the color is fake. If it's just on the hairs, nobody can tell that I'm even wearing brow cosmetics.
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyedMist

customer_reviews.title: The best brow gel
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brow gel for several years now. It's absolutely fantastic. It goes on smoothly and looks very natural. It does a great job of filling in areas that you over plucked or just want to make your brows look fuller. It doesn't run when you sweat like mascara does. If you sweat too much, it just dissolves rather than making a mess but it has excellent staying power so don't worry about it coming off. I use it for all activities including working out or hiking. The tube lasts me 3-4 months so it's definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria girl

customer_reviews.title: Seriously overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I prefer other brands apparently because this application wants is for mascara, not short bristles to get close to the skin. Also don't like the color options. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Auburn at last
customer_reviews.text: So hard to find auburn. This product does a great job of covering grey. Super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Product!
customer_reviews.text: My go-to product. This stuff works perfect for keeping your brow hair in place. I have been using this stuff and A.B.’s brow pomade for like 4 years now. The products last so long and work so well. Definitely worth the money. Definitely 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaD

customer_reviews.title: Works on brows and those fine post partum baby hairs!
customer_reviews.text: I got this originally for my brows because my brow color usually starts fading half way through the day. After applying this over my brow color, my brows look perfect all day, no more fading! Second best thing is after having babies, my hair thinned out and with hormones I have all these new baby hairs that just stick out, this gel keeps every hair in place, my pony tails and messy buns have never looked so good!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.  Like glue but better.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute best brow gel on this planet. Yes, the price is high and you're probably wondering if it's worth it. Let me answer that for you: Yes, IT IS worth it. It's very easy to apply, looks great over brows that have been filled in (the gel defines the brow hair so that they remain looking real after you've filled them in), and it lasts ALL DAY LONG. It doesn't turn white and flake off, it literally remains perfect all day.
customer_reviews.author: ScarletSwitchit

customer_reviews.title: Love the spoolie brush on this
customer_reviews.text: Love the spoolie brush on this, it is wider set that a lot of other ones I've tried and I think it helps avoid clumping and really coats all the hairs. I would definitely recommend this product. I got the color espresso which works fine for me. I have dyed dark hair and brows and use this over the dip brow pomade in ebony. However, I could also use the color granite and definitely get away with it. Espresso is a nice neutral darker brown but definitely a little bit lighter than the dip brow I'm using.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Top broke off after 3rd use-good product tho
customer_reviews.text: Love Anastasia but mine broke from just opening the bottle on the 3rd use:( I’m not that strong and it was just opening and the top broke off from the little stick. GREAT product though I loved it so I ended up using an extra wand I have. Will go with a different brand next time but it’s half heartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This brow gel is amazing. I'm one of few people who doesn't fill their eyebrows in because I think it makes me look weird, so this clear gel does exactly what I need. It allows you to comb your brows to how you want, and they remain shaped throughout the day. It also does not get flakey or gross and dries in a minute or so. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This really is gel. Brush it on your brows at they will stay put all day. I think it's a great product, just know the brows will look perfect but be a little crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Ok product - just pricey!
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey - wondering if a regular mascara would work just the same if not better..... I like it though! And it stays all day! I just fill in sparse areas with a pencil and use this on top!
customer_reviews.author: JBonds007

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for low maintenance babes with brows
customer_reviews.text: I'm way more about skincare than makeup, but I will spend money on something that is easy and fast. I take 3 second to swipe this on my brows in the morning and I look more put together. I ran out and tried using hairspray on my finger to tame my brows and it was only then that I realized how good this stuff actually is. I have a few eyebrow hairs that don't like to blend in, and this gets them to stay in line all day.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Bailey

customer_reviews.title: My GO-TO for Strays
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a staple in my make-up bag for the past 7 years. I've had issues with errant brow hairs for as long as I can remember, and have tried many different formulas, wands, etc. This is by far the most effective at holding brows in place for the entire day (until you wash your face, in fact). Be sure to replace it in a timely fashion, however. After a few months of use, the bristles start to fall apart and the formula turns white and thick (probably from bacteria). I can't very well remove a star for this, as the same thing happens to any mascara-type product. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: av228

customer_reviews.title: Good for stubborn brow hairs
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I was hoping for. I've got stubborn eyebrow hairs that like to lay in different directions and this definitely helped. Sometimes I wonder if some sort of facial lotion or hair gel would do the same thing but for now I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay locatelli

customer_reviews.title: Great brow power!
customer_reviews.text: Best reddish brow mascara out there! Beautiful natural color. Makes me look younger TBH (thank god lol).
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Best brow gel I’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn’t think pricey brow gel would make that big of a difference but it does. I won’t ever buy anything else. I originally got a sample from Sephora and realized how much a quality product changes the ease of brow makeup. Works amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bush

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect brow gel. It lasts so long for my eyebrows. I have long eyebrows and I was looking for something to hold them up since I don’t want to cut them. This is the perfect gel which is quite inexpensive and lasting.
customer_reviews.author: zain

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Not sure it holds for a long time but in all fairness, I have extremely oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: lovecali

customer_reviews.title: color is off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in brunette. It is for a redhead and very light in color. Not at all what I expect for a brunette.
customer_reviews.author: denverbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Has glitter in it... I’m confused.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand why an eyebrow product with be sparkly?
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie

customer_reviews.title: The colors might not be dark enough
customer_reviews.text: The product wasn’t thick enough for me and the Alburn color wasn’t dark enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: I like it. It hold my crazy unruly brows in ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally received this product after ordering it Dec 29th It took 11 days :( I wore it Jan 9th today when i got it. I like it. It held my crazy unruly brows in place, I only put a little bit because it can flake and cake if too much is applied. I like it better than Maybelline clear mascara. Expensive but worth it. I hope it lasts for more than 1 month since i don't wear make-up every day. Try it and compare for yourself,you may like or lOve it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Bellisima

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but very heavy and dark
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product. However the pigment is very rich and dark. I preferred this to be mainly for taming, so I have to put more on....which results in very dark brows. If you want this more for the pigment and will be using it more sparingly, it's great. If you want to put enough of the gel on for taming hairs, it's going to be very dark. Mabelline brow gel works better for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fort

customer_reviews.title: Great Brow Gel
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different kinds of Brow color and I really like this one. I do wish the Brush was tapered a bit. I still agree with what I state above; but this product is great !
customer_reviews.author: Massage Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Clear Brow
customer_reviews.text: Love this clear brow! Put over any brow product and it will last all day! Does not smudge. Never run out of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Winn

customer_reviews.title: It lasts
customer_reviews.text: This brow gel goes on easily and keeps your eyebrows in place. It's almost dry when you apply it. I've used Mary Kay brow gel witch goes on wet and I like this much better.
customer_reviews.author: flozie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing in it!
customer_reviews.text: If u can give 0 stars I would waste of money. Nothing was in it ! Terribly upset.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Joffe

customer_reviews.title: Anastaia's brow collection is easy to use and worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Anastasia for years! I actually use to see her in her Beverly Hills location but when she put out her product line, I didn't have to make that long drive anymore. Anastaia's brow collection is easy to use and worth every cent! A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: I have used this eyebrow gel for years, but I always bought it at a cosmetics counter in the past. This tube seems old and mostly dried out. Not like what I have bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: runnerclm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect browns!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Clear gel because that is what my brow esthetician suggested. I love it as it make my brows look highly manicured and also makes my eyes look larger! Love it! I purchased both the brow pencil and gel made my Anastasia!
customer_reviews.author: Princessa

customer_reviews.title: Best brow gel ever
customer_reviews.text: Best gel out there- the brow applicator tames and controls the gel holds everything in perfect place no need to reapply all day!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Does its job. :)
customer_reviews.text: I gave four stars because while this product definitely does its job (keep your eyebrows in place and neat looking), one needs to be careful trying to get this product off. Without the appropriate amount of soap and water, I actually pulled out a few eyebrows by accident trying to get the gel off. However, like I said, add some soap and warm water and it should come off just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Britt.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I'm very happy that I can purchase it on Amazon! I previously had to buy it at the mall. Also, the seller is awesome and I appreciate that!
customer_reviews.author: Carol F

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Your eyebrows stay in place for the entire day. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joy J.

customer_reviews.title: My preference of this sort of product for many years
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, looks natural and good selection of color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Quality downhill
customer_reviews.text: Quality has gone down. New bottle but feel like can’t get anything out of it. Don’t know if it dried out or formula sucks now. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ILaw

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love this brow gel!! It goes on easy, looks natural, & doesn’t flake. The bottle also lasts a fairly long time, I’ve had mine for 4 months & I use it daily. Really happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: JenRA

customer_reviews.title: do these expire??
customer_reviews.text: sorry to write a bad review. but I think I may have gotten an old or expired on. It seems totally dry. Very expensive and very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Band

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer changed the brush style and I noticed that the container is smaller. Overall, good product for filling and shaping eyebrows
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff to keep in your makeup bag.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with and it does a pretty good job. It might take a couple of swipes for those tough to tame brow hairs. You might need to refresh it if you go from work to dinner. I like that it is clear so you can use your favorite brow color. I recommend the clear gel first and when it dries, the color of your choice. It can be removed easily with your nighttime face cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! My eyebrows stay perfect and in place all day long. Good for sensitive skin. Will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and liked it. It works and it takes care of the unruly eyebrow hairs. Would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for quite sometime. It is fantastic and lasts for a very long while but looks best when it is replied after five hours or so. Well, that's what works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Holden

customer_reviews.title: Best brow gel
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brow gel for years. I was introduced to this gel at a local Anastasia brow bar. Easy to use. Last all day. Disappointed that brow bar located in a high end department store is closed. No other salon trims brows with same technique.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for several years
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of this product. My favorite brow gel for years.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: No flaking like some products. Goes on light and keeps brown in place
customer_reviews.author: Md1

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my forst experience with the famous Anastasia Beverly Hills line, and so far I like this brow gel: it serves its purpose to hold in place unruly brow hairs. It needs to be applied only once (at least for me).
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: This brow product will occasionally leave a couple of loose color flakes, but overall I like it and glad I made the purchase. It enhances my brows.
customer_reviews.author: B Moore

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I haven't tried other brow gels so I can't compare this one to others, but this has done the job well for me. I got the clear gel. It's lightweight and I don't feel it at all, and it does a great job at setting my brows and keeping them perfectly shaped all day.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: The best brow gel out there. It keeps my brows in place for an entire 12+ hour shift at work. The auburn color is perfect for me. I have dark red hair and it’s not too orange.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to purchase the right color
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It’s light and not chacky. Best brow gel.
customer_reviews.author: Naturallyyolette

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Color is fine but it flakes off and does not go on evenly
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Only brow gel I use holds all day and night
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: It does what it’s suppose to do and lasts a lo time.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product to keep my brows in place for some time. It does the trick. Lasts a long time and couldn’t be easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: johna madigan

customer_reviews.title: i love this stuff and use it daily
customer_reviews.text: i love this stuff and use it daily. it doesn't get gooey or run down when i work out. If you apply it too heavily, it may look flaky when it's very cold out and skin is dryer. This can be avoided though because it will look too wet so you just brush it out a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love this brow gel so much! I have used other brow gels and my brow hairs always reverted to their natural, askew positions. This brow gel absolutely holds my unruly brow hairs in place ALL DAY, through sweat and oil and rain and whatever else! I'm really pleased with this purchase, it was definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude865

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: works well, if you don't have much eyebrow hair than I would not recommend, but it is good to top over filled in brows too.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Keeps brows in place
customer_reviews.text: Keeps brows in place all day I use on lashes too
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Strongly disliked this product. First of all it cake unwrapped- no protection seal... Secondly, the color was really off and the way it goes on to the brows feels cakey. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Vazart

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Tried this instead of my typical Mary Kay brand. It’s nice but doesn’t hold very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product! After using the MAC brow finish for a long time, I was looking for something different. This one is more of a liquid and must be shaken well before use. However the color is vibrant (espresso) and goes on very even and smooth. It also gives the eyebrows a slightly glossy appearance, which I really like. Will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Finding Beauty in the Little Things

customer_reviews.title: Brow Gel
customer_reviews.text: I use this after I have applied brow pencil. It helps hold everything in place
customer_reviews.author: Mommakescakes

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what I wanted it to do - keeps my brows in the shape I want them in. Its colorless, not goopy, and lasts all day. For a more dramatic look, I use the Anastasia brow wiz first, and this product second. For an every day look I use this alone. Wipes off easily at the end of the day with a warm wet cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: I'd been using Granite for a few years but of ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd been using Granite for a few years but of late had been feeling that it was too stark a contrast. The Espresso color is more suitable for my complexion and hair color.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great clear brow gel
customer_reviews.text: Love this brow gel It does everything it should and lasts all day
customer_reviews.author: GypsyMountain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: One of my friends from work recommended it and since she has a good taste when it comes to cosmetics I followed her advice. I love the product because it is easy to apply and then it stays a long time without retouching
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this at Sephora at my local shopping mall and needed to reorder and this was a better price on Amazon and I didn't have to pay shipping due to having Amazon Prime. This product stays on all day and I have no complaints. It also doesn't smear your brow pencil which is a plus. This is good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Paris Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Espresso is Glittery
customer_reviews.text: The description says "A shimmer that dries to a matte finish." Upon application, it's a lot more glittery and shimmery than matte and doesn't dry down to a more matte finish. The color is a neutral brown but the glitter/pearl particles are warm copper. I don't know what part of this is "matte" and I wish they were more explicit about the shininess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot because it’s not too havy, you don’t even notice that you are using something. I purchased the no color one. A little bit pricy but it lasts for a long time, I hope
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

product_meta.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills Tinted Brow Gel, Clear
feature_bullets: Features a lightweight, colorless formula that delivers flexible hold that lasts
The brush deposits just the right amount of product, so you can apply with control
The formula holds hairs in place without a stiff feel
Dries down completely clear without leaving any residue
Gives brows a fuller, hydrated appearance with a polished finish
